name: Hexenjagd
description:
After you brew a potion for the neighbours' cow and and the villagers catch you, you have to run for your life.  To survive you have to shoot them with your spells! Watch out for the very pointy pitchforks. 

Navigate through the dangerous area by using the arrow keys and shoot the enemies with spacebar.

Art - Lamara

Sound Design - Cracklius aka JumanTH

Game Developement - Lukutaki
